XENO BENCHMARK 2

Click on chapter 1.1 to start the demo

In this demo, we implemented the basic enemy, turret, and wall.

The enemy will walk towards the generator. You can block the enemy using wall / turret. When an enemy is blocked, he will attack the obstacles until there is none.

Left click on the map to place down enemy/turret/wall.

NOTE: The generator has inifinite health. So, there is no winning / losing yet.

Press

  • 1 for wall
  • 2 for turret
  • 3 for enemy
